item.title: Can’t upgrade esxi 5.5 to 6.0 due a vib conflict
item.description:
Today I tried to upgrade my standalone (not in Cluster) host (HP DL 180 G6) with esxi 6.0 and Update Manager. But when the process starts I had received this error:

The upgrade contains the following set of cpnflicting VIBs:

Mellanox_bootbank_net-mlx4-en_1.9.9.0-1OEM.550.0.0.1331820

item.title: VMware VSAN Health Check Plugin Installation
VMware Tools for Nested ESXi
item.description: Wow. You can install VMware Tools for Nested ESXi now. The VIB package provides a VMware Tools service (vmtoolsd) for running inside a nested ESXi virtual machine. The following capabilities are exposed through VMware Tools:
